fields.title: Take Away
fields.excerpt: Coming Soon: Take Away collection or delivery
fields.content:
When you just don’t feel like cooking and want to treat the family to a hearty meal, you can soon order from Arthur & Alfie's menu online for collection or home delivery.

View our menu, pick your collection or delivery time, and we’ll get all your meals freshly made and ready to go.

Further updates coming soon.

fields.title: Kids Meals
fields.excerpt: Helping to support your kids 5 a day fresh fruit and vegetables
fields.content:
We care about your children’s wellbeing as much as you do. That’s why our kids’ dishes are full of locally sourced, fresh ingredients that makes getting your 5 a day as easy peas..sy as 1 2 3.

Whether its a mini sized Mum and Dad meal or off the kids menu, we’ve got plenty of tasty dishes to choose from.

We welcome you and the family to Arthur & Alfie's.

fields.title: Christmas 2021
fields.content:
We’ve got your festive favourites for Christmas covered and we can’t wait to share it with you.

Whether it’s Christmas Day dinner traditional turkey or vegan meat loaf, cold meat and cheese selections, we have a range of dishes to suit. Come and celebrate with us, bring all the family along!

Why not book your table today?
